title: Podcast: GenAI Security: Defending Against Deepfakes and Automated Social Engineering
description: In this episode, QCon AI New York 2025 Chair Wes Reisz speaks with Reken CEO and Google Trust & Safety founder Shuman Ghosemajumder about the erosion of digital trust. They explore how deepfakes and automated social engineering are scaling cybercrime and argu…
content: <ul><li>Cybercrime has shifted from linear physical threats to exponential digital attacks, where Generative AI enables criminals to simulate human behavior and launch simultaneous, high-volume attac… [+45143 chars]
